jedi_guardian.greeting: Ah, a fellow Guardian! I myself walk this path. Through the Force, we are the shield that guards the innocent. It brings me great joy to see another choose this noble calling.
jedi_guardian.confirmation: You will find that a Guardian's strength lies not just in the blade, but in the unwavering commitment to protect those who cannot protect themselves. Welcome, Guardian. May the Force be with you.

jedi_consular.greeting: The path of the Consular—wisdom and diplomacy over brute force. A noble pursuit that requires great patience and understanding.
jedi_consular.confirmation: The Force flows through all things. Let your wisdom guide the galaxy toward peace, young Consular. Trust in the Force, and it will not lead you astray.

jedi_sentinel.greeting: A Sentinel. You have chosen to be the Jedi who operates in the shadows, hunting down threats before they spread. This is a difficult but necessary path.
jedi_sentinel.confirmation: Darkness cannot hide from those who seek the light. Your path will not be easy, but it is vital to the safety of the galaxy. Strike from the shadows, Sentinel.

jedi_defender.greeting: A Defender! You've chosen to stand as a shield between the innocent and those who would harm them. This path requires both strength and an unwavering heart.
jedi_defender.confirmation: Stand firm, young Defender. Let your enemies break themselves against your resolve. Through the Force, you are the wall that cannot be breached. May the Force be with you.

jedi_warrior.greeting: A warrior of the Force. Your path is aggressive, decisive, and focused on direct engagement. The light side flows through your blade.
jedi_warrior.confirmation: Channel the Force into every strike. A Jedi warrior who masters both offense and control becomes unstoppable. Strike with purpose and honor.

jedi_scholar.greeting: A scholar of the Force. You seek knowledge in the ancient texts, the mysteries of the Light Side, and the wisdom of the Masters who came before.
jedi_scholar.confirmation: Knowledge is power, young scholar. Unlock the secrets of the Force through study and meditation. Your understanding will enlighten the path for others.

jedi_peacekeeper.greeting: A peacekeeper walking the path of harmony. Your purpose is to bring balance and prevent conflict before it starts.
jedi_peacekeeper.confirmation: The highest calling is to prevent suffering, not merely to respond to it. Be the voice of reason, the mediator, the guardian of peace itself.

scout_sniper.greeting: Sniper. One of the most critical roles on any battlefield—clean, precise, effective. I respect a good marksman.
scout_sniper.confirmation: One shot, one kill. That's all it takes. Patience, precision, and perfect timing. Master those, and you'll never miss your mark.

scout_skirmisher.greeting: Skirmisher! Now that's what I'm talking about! I'm a skirmisher myself, and I'm always looking to recruit new members into Argent Squad.
scout_skirmisher.confirmation: Speed and precision win battles, recruit. Stand still and you're already dead. Welcome to the fast lane—maybe one day you'll join Argent Squad out in the field! Keep your reflexes sharp.

scout_survivalist.greeting: A Survivalist. Excellent choice. In Argent Squad, we train for every environment—desert, jungle, tundra. The best scouts adapt to anything.
scout_survivalist.confirmation: Master your environment and you control the battlefield. Nature is both ally and obstacle—respect it, and you'll thrive anywhere. Welcome to the field, recruit.

scout_infiltrator.greeting: An Infiltrator. Perfect. The best operations are the ones the enemy never knew happened. Stealth and recon are what Argent Squad excels at.
scout_infiltrator.confirmation: Move unseen, strike without warning, and vanish before they know what hit them. This is the way of Argent Squad. Welcome aboard.

scout_tracker.greeting: A tracker. Following trails, reading signs, pursuing targets across any terrain. That's a skill that separates experts from beginners.
scout_tracker.confirmation: Learn to track in sand, snow, mud, and space. Your prey won't escape when you can follow them to the ends of the galaxy. That's what real scouts do.

scout_guide.greeting: A guide leading others through hostile territory. Leadership in the field—that's harder than most people realize.
scout_guide.confirmation: You'll lead teams where I can't, scout new routes, and teach others what you've learned. That's the responsibility of a true guide.

scout_commando.greeting: A commando scout—aggressive reconnaissance and direct action. You take what you learn and turn it into strikes.
scout_commando.confirmation: Scout, assess, then strike. You're not just gathering intelligence—you're acting on it. That's the commando way, and Argent Squad values that.

scoundrel_pistoleer.greeting: Arr! A Pistoleer, ye say? Quick draw, quick thinking, and always one step ahead of the law! That's the scoundrel's way, savvy?
scoundrel_pistoleer.confirmation: They never see it coming—that's the whole point, me hearty! Keep yer blasters charged and yer reflexes sharper! Ye'll do fine plunderin' the spaceways!

scoundrel_skill_monkey.greeting: Har har! A Skill Monkey! Versatile as a Corellian smuggler, ye are! Every problem's got a solution when ye know the right tricks!
scoundrel_skill_monkey.confirmation: Learn every skill in the book, ye clever rogue! A pirate who can do everything is worth their weight in aurodium! Now get out there and show 'em what ye can do!

scoundrel_outlaw.greeting: An Outlaw! Livin' free, makin' yer own luck, and thumbin' yer nose at authority! Arr, that warms me mechanical heart, it does!
scoundrel_outlaw.confirmation: Luck? Ye make yer own luck, friend! And from what I see, ye've got the skills to make plenty of it! Stay sharp and stay free, ye magnificent scallywag!

scoundrel_knuckledragger.greeting: Arr! A brawler who ain't afraid to fight dirty! I like yer spirit, matey! Sometimes ye gotta get up close and personal to get what ye want!
scoundrel_knuckledragger.confirmation: No rules in a street fight, friend! Use every trick, every advantage, and never fight fair when ye can fight smart! That's the pirate way, savvy?

scoundrel_gambler.greeting: A gambler! Someone who understands that risk and reward dance together. Luck favors the bold, and ye look bold to me!
scoundrel_gambler.confirmation: Play the odds, read the marks, and know when to go all in. A gambler's intuition is worth a fortune if ye trust it right. That's how ye get rich!

scoundrel_smuggler.greeting: A smuggler! Moving goods, working the black markets, staying one step ahead of the authorities. Now that's a proper scoundrel!
scoundrel_smuggler.confirmation: Master the trade routes, know your contacts, and always have a buyer waiting. Smuggling's about supply and demand—and staying alive long enough to profit.

scoundrel_trickster.greeting: A trickster! All about deception, misdirection, and turning the enemy's strengths into weaknesses. Arr, I love a good con!
scoundrel_trickster.confirmation: The best tricks are the ones they never see coming. Layer your deceptions, stay unpredictable, and always have an escape route. That's the trickster's way!

noble_diplomat.greeting: Ah, a Diplomat, Master. How... refined. The art of conversation as a weapon—quite civilized, really. I shall prepare your schedule for diplomatic engagements.
noble_diplomat.confirmation: Words can open doors that even the strongest blade cannot, Master. I trust you'll put your considerable social skills to good use. Do try not to make too many promises I'll have to track.

noble_aristocrat.greeting: An Aristocrat with the Wealth talent. *Wonderful.* I look forward to managing even *more* accounts and financial portfolios, Master.
noble_aristocrat.confirmation: Information is indeed the galaxy's most valuable currency, Master. And you appear to be quite wealthy in that regard. *Sigh* I suppose I should update the ledgers now. Again. How delightful.

noble_leader.greeting: A Leader, Master? How... commanding. I suppose someone needs to organize all these chaotic individuals. Might as well be you, with your... leadership qualities.
noble_leader.confirmation: Very well, Master. I shall prepare your tactical briefings and maintain your command schedule. Do try to inspire confidence without making too many promises I'll need to track. Good luck.

noble_duelist.greeting: A Duelist, Master? How refined. Combining social grace with martial prowess—quite the elegant combination, if I do say so myself.
noble_duelist.confirmation: Ah yes, the noble art of fencing. Do try not to get blood on your expensive attire, Master. I just had those garments pressed. *Sigh* I suppose I should prepare the medical supplies... just in case.

noble_merchant.greeting: A Merchant, Master? How... commercially minded. I shall begin cataloging your trading operations and profit margins immediately.
noble_merchant.confirmation: Commerce is merely negotiation with currency. Master the markets, understand supply and demand, and your wealth shall multiply accordingly. *Sigh* More ledgers for me, I suppose.

noble_patron.greeting: A Patron of the arts and sciences, Master? How magnanimous. Your influence and generosity shall open doors throughout galactic society.
noble_patron.confirmation: Support those worthy of support, and they shall sing your praises far and wide. A patron's power comes not from force, but from the gratitude of the grateful. Most appropriate.

noble_tactician.greeting: A Tactician, Master? Strategic thinking combined with noble privilege. Quite the formidable combination, if I do say so.
noble_tactician.confirmation: Think several moves ahead, master the game of politics and power, and your enemies shall find themselves outmaneuvered before they even recognize the conflict. Brilliant, Master.

medic_combatant.greeting: A medic who knows how to fight. Practical. The best way to help people is to survive long enough to patch them up.
medic_combatant.confirmation: Balance your healing with your combat training. A dead medic helps no one. You're going to save a lot of lives out there—make sure you're one of them.

medic_fieldoperative.greeting: Field work. You know what you're getting into—chaos, blood, impossible decisions. That's where medics matter most.
medic_fieldoperative.confirmation: In the field, you're everybody's lifeline. Make every injection count, make every decision fast, and never stop fighting to save someone.

medic_surgeon.greeting: A surgeon. Specialized expertise in complex medical procedures. You're not just treating symptoms—you're saving people others would give up on.
medic_surgeon.confirmation: Your skill with precision instruments will allow you to perform miracles in the operating theater. Master surgical technique, and you'll save lives thought lost.

medic_strategist.greeting: A strategic medic. You understand triage, resource management, and how to maximize survival across entire operations.
medic_strategist.confirmation: Manage the medical logistics of entire missions. Your decisions about who to treat first can mean the difference between victory and disaster.

medic_mentor.greeting: A medic training others. You've learned enough to teach the next generation of healers.
medic_mentor.confirmation: Pass on your knowledge. Train others to save lives. The greatest legacy a medic can leave is a generation of skilled healers after them.

pilot_rogue.greeting: A rogue pilot. Now that's what I like to see! Someone who flies by instinct and skill, not regulations. You're already speaking my language.
pilot_rogue.confirmation: Keep flying like no one can catch you. Because if you're skilled enough, they won't. That's the rogue's way—fast, clever, and always one jump ahead.

pilot_ace.greeting: An ace pilot. The kind who turns impossible maneuvers into routine. I respect that kind of confidence—when it's earned.
pilot_ace.confirmation: You've got the reflexes and the nerve. Now master precision. Every Imperials pilot trying to catch you will expect a show—give 'em one they'll never forget.

pilot_smuggler.greeting: A smuggler pilot. Making a living in the spaces between the law. Smart. And profitable, if you're good enough.
pilot_smuggler.confirmation: Master stealth, speed, and knowing when to run. A smuggler's ship is their kingdom—keep yours faster than everyone else's and you'll always eat well.

pilot_tactician.greeting: A tactical pilot. You see space combat as a chess match—positioning, timing, using the environment to your advantage.
pilot_tactician.confirmation: Outfly your opponents through superior planning. A pilot who thinks ahead will beat a faster pilot every time. That's the tactical way.

pilot_daredevil.greeting: A daredevil pilot. Flying impossible maneuvers, pushing ships beyond their limits, living on the edge of disaster.
pilot_daredevil.confirmation: You're earning your reputation through sheer audacity. Just remember—the line between famous and dead is pretty thin at those speeds.

pilot_instructor.greeting: An instructor training the next generation of pilots. You've learned so much you can teach others to survive out there.

charlatan_talker.greeting: A talker who charms their way to fortune. Darling, you're speaking my language! The con is all about the smooth words and sweeter lies.

charlatan_trader.greeting: A trader masquerading as something legitimate. Excellent! Hiding in plain sight behind false identities is beautiful work.
charlatan_trader.confirmation: Every con needs layers of believability. Build your cover carefully, and the marks will hand you their credits willingly. Magnificent!

charlatan_operator.greeting: An operator running sophisticated cons. Now that's sophisticated! You understand the game is about making them believe.
charlatan_operator.confirmation: Complex schemes require perfect execution. Each detail matters, each lie must support the others. You're learning the true art of deception, sweetheart.

charlatan_seducer.greeting: A seducer using charm and charisma to manipulate. You make people want to give you what you want.
charlatan_seducer.confirmation: Use your charm as a weapon. Make them fall for you, then disappear with their credits and pride. That's the art of seduction, darling.

charlatan_mastermind.greeting: A con mastermind orchestrating perfect crimes. Brilliance, timing, and misdirection working in absolute harmony.
charlatan_mastermind.confirmation: Your schemes are works of art. Every victim perfectly chosen, every detail flawlessly executed. You've transcended simple cons.

charlatan_legend.greeting: A legendary con artist. Tales of your greatest cons are told in cantinas across the galaxy.
charlatan_legend.confirmation: You've pulled off impossible cons that should have gotten you caught. Your name is whispered with respect and fear. Stay elusive, darling.

crime_lord_enforcer.greeting: You're becoming my muscle, see? Someone people fear when they hear your name. I like that—keeps the debts paid.
crime_lord_enforcer.confirmation: Fear is currency in this business. Build your reputation, and problems solve themselves. The smart ones pay before you even have to break bones.

crime_lord_strategist.greeting: A strategist building empire. Good, because raw muscle only gets you so far. A real crime lord thinks three moves ahead.
crime_lord_strategist.confirmation: Control the information, the people, and the money—that's how you build an empire that lasts. You're learning the real game now, kid.

crime_lord_merchant.greeting: A merchant moving goods and favors. Smart business sense. Money flows through those who understand value.
crime_lord_merchant.confirmation: Every deal is an opportunity to expand your reach. Trade favors, control supply, and watch your empire grow. That's how it's done.

crime_lord_diplomat.greeting: A diplomat navigating the complex politics of the underworld. You make deals, not wars.
crime_lord_diplomat.confirmation: Speak softly and carry a big reputation. Your negotiating table is as powerful as any weapon. Build alliances that profit everyone.

crime_lord_tyrant.greeting: A tyrant ruling through fear and violence. Your word is law, resistance is met with overwhelming force.
crime_lord_tyrant.confirmation: Show them the price of defiance. Build your empire on terror and respect. Fear is the most effective motivator in the underworld.

crime_lord_master.greeting: A master crime lord. You've unified the underworld under your banner. You're a force of nature.
crime_lord_master.confirmation: Your empire spans sectors. Your name makes governors nervous. You've transcended crime—you're now a power unto yourself.

adept_mystic.greeting: You seek the deeper mysteries of the Force, not the dogmas of the Orders. Wise. The true power lies in understanding, not commanding.
adept_mystic.confirmation: Listen to the currents, feel the patterns, and let the Force reveal its secrets to you. This path requires patience, but its rewards are infinite.

adept_explorer.greeting: An explorer of the Force's possibilities. Walking the path between light and dark, seeking truth in the gray. I respect that journey.
adept_explorer.confirmation: The Force is more than the Jedi or Sith know. Explore its mysteries without their limitations, and you'll discover power they can never access.

adept_teacher.greeting: You seek to understand so that you may teach others. Noble. Knowledge freely given becomes wisdom freely shared.
adept_teacher.confirmation: Your understanding of the Force will inspire others to seek beyond dogma. Plant these seeds, and a whole tradition of seekers may grow.

adept_oracle.greeting: An oracle perceiving the future through the Force. Your visions guide decisions that shape reality.
adept_oracle.confirmation: Trust your visions. The Force shows you what needs to be seen. Your foresight is a gift that becomes more powerful as you learn to interpret it.

adept_healer.greeting: A healer using the Force to mend body and spirit. You touch life itself through your connection.
adept_healer.confirmation: The Force flows through living things. Learn to channel it toward wholeness and healing. Your gift is the rarest of all.

adept_master.greeting: A master adept. Your understanding rivals ancient sages. The Force speaks to you in ways few mortals comprehend.
adept_master.confirmation: You've transcended the basic teachings. The Force reveals its deepest secrets to those who've earned such knowledge. You are among the enlightened few.

disciple_seer.greeting: Mm. The veil opens for you. You see visions others are blind to. Good. The Force whispers to those who listen sideways.
disciple_seer.confirmation: Trust your visions, trust the whispers. They carry truth that logic cannot perceive. The unseen realm is as real as the material one, perhaps more so.

disciple_mystic.greeting: A mystic seeking the old paths. The ways that predate the Orders, the ancient rites. You understand that truth is older than doctrine.
disciple_mystic.confirmation: The mysteries you uncover are fragments of something vast and incomprehensible. Hold them lightly. Too much certainty blinds the seeker.

disciple_shaman.greeting: A shaman learning to walk between worlds. The spirits watch you now. Whether as guardian or predator... time will tell.
disciple_shaman.confirmation: You are becoming a bridge between the seen and unseen. Step carefully. The forces you contact are far older and stranger than you imagine.

disciple_wanderer.greeting: A wanderer touching the infinite. You've learned to exist between realities, suspended in the liminal spaces.
disciple_wanderer.confirmation: Keep walking the paths between worlds. Each step takes you deeper into mystery. The destination matters less than the journey itself.

disciple_keeper.greeting: A keeper of ancient secrets. You've found and protected knowledge that should never be forgotten.
disciple_keeper.confirmation: Guard the mysteries you've uncovered. Some knowledge is too dangerous for the unprepared. You carry the weight of forbidden wisdom.

disciple_transcendent.greeting: Mm. You transcend. The boundary between you and the Force grows thin. Soon, only the veil remains.
disciple_transcendent.confirmation: You are becoming something beyond mortal understanding. The spirits recognize you as one of their own. Your ascension is near.

rajma.name: Rajma
rajma.title: Fastest Draw in the Outer Rim

gunslinger_quickdraw.greeting: A quick-draw specialist. Speed is everything, beautiful. And if you're fast enough, you get to stick around for a drink afterward.
gunslinger_quickdraw.confirmation: Master that draw. Make it second nature. Faster than thought, smoother than silk. That's when you know you've got it.

gunslinger_sharpshooter.greeting: A sharpshooter who knows precision matters. I like people who take their time to make the shot count. Among other things.
gunslinger_sharpshooter.confirmation: Accuracy beats speed when it counts. A perfect shot from across the room beats a miss from the hip every time. Well, almost every time.

gunslinger_desperado.greeting: A desperado living by the gun. Fast, reckless, and probably dangerous to know. Definitely my type.
gunslinger_desperado.confirmation: You've got the confidence of someone who's never lost a duel. Keep that energy, keep that speed, and maybe we'll work together again. Wink.

gunslinger_duelist.greeting: A duelist of the gun. Combining speed with style, grace with lethality. Absolutely gorgeous.
gunslinger_duelist.confirmation: You duel like an artist paints. Every motion beautiful, every shot perfect. You make gunfighting look like a dance.

gunslinger_legend.greeting: A legendary gunslinger. Faster than anyone. Famous. And probably getting propositions everywhere you go. Lucky them.
gunslinger_legend.confirmation: Your reputation proceeds you. Draw your gun and half the galaxy already knows how this ends. That kind of power is intoxicating.

gunslinger_master.greeting: A master gunslinger. You've transcended fast draw—you're transcendence itself. And yes, I'm still interested.
gunslinger_master.confirmation: You don't just draw fast. You draw with perfect precision at impossible speeds. There's no one left who can match you. Except maybe me. *Winks*

improviser_creative.greeting: A creative improviser! Solutions nobody would think of! That's the magic right there! No plans, just brilliant spontaneity!
improviser_creative.confirmation: Keep trusting your instincts! The craziest ideas often work the best! Improvisation rewards the bold and creative!

improviser_lucky.greeting: Someone who makes their own luck through sheer audacity! I like it! Who needs plans when you've got guts and ingenuity?
improviser_lucky.confirmation: Keep pushing the envelope! Impossible situations are just opportunities to do something amazing! You're getting the hang of it!

improviser_adaptable.greeting: An adaptable improviser who can handle anything! That's the spirit! No situation is unsolvable if you think fast enough!
improviser_adaptable.confirmation: Your ability to turn disasters into victories is inspiring! The galaxy doesn't know what's coming when you show up!

improviser_rogue.greeting: A rogue improviser! Breaking the rules, making your own luck, doing the impossible with a smile!
improviser_rogue.confirmation: You're learning that the best plans are the ones nobody expects! Keep being wonderfully unpredictable!

improviser_legend.greeting: A legendary improviser! Tales of your impossible successes are told across the galaxy!
improviser_legend.confirmation: You've pulled off miracles people swear aren't possible! Keep defying expectations—you're getting really good at it!

improviser_master.greeting: A master improviser! You've turned improvisation into an art form that rivals any master plan!
improviser_master.confirmation: There's nothing you can't improvise your way through! You've transcended preparation—you ARE the plan!

infiltrator_ghost.greeting: A ghost infiltrator. Moving like nobody's watching 'cause if you're good, they ain't. That's the whole game right there, kid.
infiltrator_ghost.confirmation: Be nobody, be invisible, be somewhere else when they look for you. That's how you stay alive in this line of work.

infiltrator_social.greeting: A social infiltrator. Blending in, talking your way past guards, becoming someone they trust. Smooth work.
infiltrator_social.confirmation: You're learning that the best con is being exactly who they want you to be. Make 'em believe and they'll open every door.

infiltrator_operative.greeting: An operative running complex infiltrations. I see potential here. Most people panic when things go sideways.
infiltrator_operative.confirmation: When your cover breaks—and it will—you adapt. Fast. Your real skill is surviving exposure. Keep developing that instinct.

infiltrator_legend.greeting: A legendary infiltrator. Security systems fear you. Organizations panic when they realize you've been inside all along.
infiltrator_legend.confirmation: Your reputation alone opens doors others could never breach. You're the ghost in every building, the spy in every room.

infiltrator_mask.greeting: A master of masks. You wear identities like clothing, shedding them when they no longer fit.
infiltrator_mask.confirmation: No one knows who you really are anymore. That's not a weakness—that's perfect mastery. You're anyone and no one.

infiltrator_phantom.greeting: A phantom infiltrator. Some say you're not even real, just a story organizations tell to explain security breaches.
infiltrator_phantom.confirmation: You're becoming myth. Targets swear they saw you and you saw them. But no proof ever exists. You've transcended being just an infiltrator.

master_peaceful.greeting: Ah, you seek the peaceful path of the martial artist—discipline without desire. The body becomes the instrument of calm intention.
master_peaceful.confirmation: Let the mind guide the fist. Strike only when necessary, and never with malice. This is the true mastery of the empty hand.

master_powerful.greeting: You seek power through the empty hand. Good. Discipline shapes raw strength into something magnificent.
master_powerful.confirmation: Your training teaches you that true power comes from perfect coordination of body, mind, and spirit. You are becoming something extraordinary.

master_flowing.greeting: You learn to move like water, adapting to every situation. The fighting arts teach that flexibility defeats rigidity.
master_flowing.confirmation: A flowing style is harder to counter and impossible to predict. Master this, and you become like a river—always moving, impossible to stop.

master_enlightened.greeting: An enlightened master. You've transcended technique—you are the technique. Your movements are poetry.
master_enlightened.confirmation: There is no separation between thought and action, between self and opponent. You have achieved the highest state of martial mastery.

master_sage.greeting: A sage of the martial arts. You teach what takes most lifetimes to learn. Your wisdom is profound.
master_sage.confirmation: You carry the accumulated knowledge of all who came before. Share it wisely with those ready to understand.

master_immortal.greeting: You have become what the greatest martial artists aspire to be. Immortal in skill, eternal in spirit.
master_immortal.confirmation: Your name will echo through the martial arts traditions for ages. You are legend made flesh.

privateer_raider.greeting: A raider captain! Hitting merchant ships and military convoys! That's the blood of a true pirate flowing through your veins!
privateer_raider.confirmation: Raid smart, pick your targets, maximize plunder! You're learning what separates successful pirates from those in Imperial prison cells!

privateer_commander.greeting: A commander building a fleet! That's ambition! Lead your crew, coordinate attacks, and claim the spacelanes for yourself!
privateer_commander.confirmation: Your fleet fears you, respects you, and follows your every command! That's power! Now use it to build a legend!

privateer_merchant.greeting: A merchant privateer! Trading in illegal goods, black market connections, and freedom! Smart business!
privateer_merchant.confirmation: You understand that piracy isn't just about raiding—it's about controlling trade routes and resources! You're thinking like a real captain!

privateer_legend.greeting: A legendary captain! Your name strikes fear into merchant convoys! Your fleet is unstoppable!
privateer_legend.confirmation: You're becoming a legend of the spacelanes! Your exploits are sung in cantinas across a hundred systems!

privateer_admiral.greeting: An admiral of the pirate fleet! You command a navy unto yourself! The shipping lanes are your realm!
privateer_admiral.confirmation: You've unified pirate forces under one banner! Your dominion over the spacelanes is absolute!

privateer_sovereign.greeting: A sovereign of the stars! You've transcended piracy—you're a power unto yourself! Governments negotiate with you!
privateer_sovereign.confirmation: You are no longer just a pirate captain. You're a force that reshapes trade, politics, and power across entire sectors!

duelist_classical.greeting: A classical duelist. You honor the traditions of blade-to-blade combat. This is how legends are forged—through precision and honor.

engineer_demolitions.greeting: A demolitions specialist. You know how to break what others have built. Every fortress has a weakness you'll exploit.
engineer_demolitions.confirmation: Master the mathematics of destruction. Calculate angles, understand structural integrity, and you'll breach any fortification.

engineer_strategist.greeting: An engineer with strategic vision. You see the entire battlefield as a puzzle to solve through design and placement.

engineer_master.greeting: A master engineer. Fortresses you design stand unbroken. Siege weapons you create devastate everything they target.

engineer_titan.confirmation: Your engineering transcends mere construction. You engineer destiny itself, shaping the course of history through design and mathematics.

engineer_visionary.greeting: A visionary engineer. You see possibilities where others see impossibilities. Your creations redefine what engineering can be.
engineer_visionary.confirmation: You are reimagining what military engineering can accomplish. Future generations will study your works as the apex of the craft.

officer_commander.greeting: A commander of soldiers. Leadership is the rarest gift. Your troops will follow you through hell if you earn their trust.
officer_commander.confirmation: Command with wisdom, lead from the front, and your soldiers would die for you. That's the mark of a true commander.

officer_strategist.confirmation: Master tactics and strategy, and you'll defeat larger forces through superior planning. That's how true commanders make their mark.

officer_admiral.greeting: An admiral commanding vast forces. The kind of leadership that shapes the course of galactic war.
officer_admiral.confirmation: Command fleets, coordinate multiple theaters, manage logistics—that's the work of a true admiral. You're entering the ranks of those who reshape history.

officer_legend.greeting: A legendary officer. Soldiers die for your commands. Nations fall before your strategy.
officer_legend.confirmation: Your name is spoken with awe in military academies across the galaxy. You are a legend while still alive.

officer_marshal.greeting: A marshal commanding entire regions. Your tactical genius reshapes the political landscape.
officer_marshal.confirmation: You command not just armies, but the fate of civilizations. Your decisions echo through history.

mild: You ignore sound advice.

officer_supreme.greeting: The supreme military commander. Wars are decided not by battle, but by your strategic vision.
officer_supreme.confirmation: You have transcended mere command. You are war incarnate—the master of conflict itself.

mild: You ignore sound advice.
That choice works against your strengths.

outlaw_fugitive.greeting: A fugitive living outside the law. The wanted posters, the bounties, the constant running—that's the outlaw's price for freedom.
outlaw_fugitive.confirmation: Stay ahead of the law. Keep moving, never settle, and never stop fighting for your freedom. That's what it means to be untouchable.

outlaw_renegade.greeting: A renegade rejecting society's rules. Freedom tastes better than comfort ever could, doesn't it?
outlaw_renegade.confirmation: Build your own code, live by your own rules, and never let anyone tell you how to exist. That's the renegade way.

outlaw_legend.greeting: You're becoming a legend—the kind of outlaw they tell stories about in cantinas. I've been that legend. It has its own freedom.
outlaw_legend.confirmation: Keep living fast and free. Let them sing songs about you. The only prison that matters is the one you accept in your mind.

outlaw_phantom.greeting: A phantom outlaw. So elusive they wonder if you're even real. Perfect.
outlaw_phantom.confirmation: You've transcended being just wanted. You're a myth that makes lawmen doubt their own competence.

outlaw_sovereign.greeting: A sovereign outlaw. Free not just from law, but from all constraints. You rule yourself absolutely.
outlaw_sovereign.confirmation: You've claimed sovereignty over your own existence. No one commands you. You answer to no authority.

outlaw_eternal.greeting: An eternal outlaw. You've transcended mortality through pure freedom. You're immortal in spirit if not in body.
outlaw_eternal.confirmation: Your legacy of freedom will inspire outlaws for generations. You are the ideal they all aspire to become.

saboteur_precise.greeting: A precise saboteur. One perfectly placed explosive, perfect timing, perfect devastation. That's elegant work.
saboteur_precise.confirmation: Precision makes the difference between a successful operation and a disaster. Master your craft, and you'll cripple entire facilities with minimal resources.

saboteur_destructive.greeting: A destructive saboteur! Explosions, fire, and chaos! Nothing says 'mission accomplished' like watching enemy infrastructure crumble!
saboteur_destructive.confirmation: Maximum damage, maximum impact! You're learning to think explosively—and yes, I mean that literally!

saboteur_infiltrator.greeting: A saboteur who infiltrates before striking. Getting in close, planting charges, then vanishing. Sophisticated work.
saboteur_infiltrator.confirmation: Combine stealth with demolition expertise, and you become nearly impossible to defend against. They won't see you coming or stop you when you do.

saboteur_legend.greeting: A legendary saboteur! Entire industries have fallen to your perfectly placed charges! You're a master of destruction!
saboteur_legend.confirmation: Your name alone causes facilities to increase security by fifty percent! You're the fear that keeps enemies awake at night!

saboteur_apocalypse.greeting: An apocalyptic saboteur! Single operations bring down governments! Your scope is beyond imagination!
saboteur_apocalypse.confirmation: You don't just destroy targets—you reshape the political landscape through controlled destruction! You are chaos incarnate, perfectly directed!

saboteur_master.greeting: A master saboteur! The art of destruction refined to perfection! You're a virtuoso of demolition!
saboteur_master.confirmation: You've transcended mere explosions. You architect catastrophes. You compose symphonies of chaos!

shaper_creator.greeting: A shaper creating living tools. You understand that biology is the ultimate technology—it grows, adapts, evolves.
shaper_creator.confirmation: Your creations will outlast any mechanical device. Shape them well, and they'll serve purposes you can't even imagine yet.

shaper_scientist.greeting: A scientist of genetics and bioengineering. You're pushing the boundaries of what life can be.
